title: Diamond Dazzle Kangan: Contemporary Elegance with Traditional Charm
materials: 18K Yellow Gold (22K gold available on request)
G color). Features a high-quality Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine.
features: A modern take on the classic Kangan, these bangles feature a delicate, openwork design. Diamonds are bezel set along the bangle's perimeter, interspersed with star-shaped gold accents. The sleek silhouette offers a contemporary appeal while maintaining the traditional significance of bangles in South Indian culture.
colors: Warm yellow gold contrasted by the brilliant white sparkle of the diamonds.
occasions: or as a sophisticated addition to everyday wear. Ideal for gifting at weddings or anniversaries.
description: These Diamond Kangans represent a harmonious blend of tradition and contemporary design. The high-quality diamonds are ethically sourced, and the 18K gold ensures lasting durability. The unique design is sure to make a statement while honoring South Indian heritage. A timeless piece to be cherished for generations.
